title: BRIEF-iHeartCommunications Electes Not To Make Interest Payment On Unsecured Notes
text:
05 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-iHeartCommunications Electes Not To Make Interest Payment On Unsecured Notes Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Iheartmedia Inc: 
* IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS, INC. ANNOUNCES THAT IT ELECTED NOT TO MAKE INTEREST PAYMENT ON UNSECURED NOTES AND WILL UTILIZE GRACE PERIOD UNDER INDENTURE 
* IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS- BOARD ELECTED NOT TO MAKE CASH INTEREST PAYMENT OF $106 MILLION, DUE FEB 1, 2018, TO HOLDERS OF 14% SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES DUE 2021 
* IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS-BOARD ELECTED NOT TO MAKE PAYMENT RELATED TO ONGOING EFFORTS TO PROACTIVELY&COMPREHENSIVELY ADDRESS COâ€˜S CAPITAL STRUCTURE Source text for Eikon:
